page.title: List of LPGA major championship winning golfers

revision.text:
{{Short description|None}} This article lists all the women (140) who have won past and present [[Women's major golf championships|major championships]] on the [[LPGA Tour]].{{cite web |url=http://www.lpga.com/tournaments/major-championship-records |title=Major Championship Records |publisher=LPGA |access-date=April 21, 2024}} They are listed in order of the number of victories. The list is updated through the 2024 season. *Winning span indicates the years from the player's first major win to the last. {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" ! Rank !! Player !! width="100"|Country !! width="60"|Winning span !! width="50"|Total !! width="50"|[[Chevron Championship|Chevron C'ship]] !! width="50"|[[Women's PGA Championship|PGA C'ship]] !! width="50"|[[U.S. Women's Open|U.S. Open]] !! width="50"|[[Women's British Open|British Open]] !! width="50"|[[Canadian Women's Open|du Maurier]] !! width="50"|[[Titleholders Championship|Title-
